info.name: Invygo
info.description:
# **Staff Scheduling application**

##### This application allows users to manage staff schedules.

###### You can find the list of api endpoints in their respective folders

*   **Auth**
    *   signup
    *   login
*   **User**
    *   get users
    *   get user
    *   create user
    *   update user
    *   delete user
    *   list users by accumulated work hours
*   **Schedule**
    *   get schedules
    *   get schedule
    *   create schedule
    *   update schedule
    *   delete schedule

request.description: Use this endpoint for user creation

exec: pm.test("Save the token in the environment", function () {

request.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve the user details and a token
Use this route to fetch all the users
Use this endpoint to fetch the user by id

Use this endpoint to create a new user with the desired role
(Admin ONLY ACCESS)

Use this endpoint to update the user info

(Admin ONLY ACCESS)
Use this endpoint to delete a user by its id

item.name: List Users By Accumulated Work Hours

request.description:
Use this endpoint to fetch users by accumulated work hours per arbitrary period
(up to 1 year)

response.name: List Users By Accumulated Work Hours Example

request.description:
Use this endpoint to fetch all schedules in the system 
Or to filter by the start date and/or end date of the schedule
Also you can filter by the schedule assigned user id

response.name: Get Schedules Example
